error.title: Oops, an error occurred!
error.description: An error occurred while running AMLL TTML Tools
error.checkDevTools: Details can be found in Developer Tools

wip.warning: This refactored version is still under development. Please keep backups of your project to avoid accidents!

empty.title: No lyric lines
empty.description: Add new lyric lines in the top panel or open/import existing lyrics from the menu

tools.error: Tokenization failed, please check console errors!

menu.error: Tokenization failed, please check console errors!

aboutModal.description: A Word-by-Word TTML Editing and Timeline Tool for Apple Music-like Lyrics

builtinOptions.artistsInvalidMsg: If there are multiple artists, please add this key multiple times instead of using delimiters; if an artist name contains delimiters, please ignore this message
builtinOptions.ncmMusicIdInvalidMsg: NetEase Music ID should be numeric
builtinOptions.qqMusicIdInvalidMsg: QQ Music ID should be alphanumeric
builtinOptions.spotifyIdInvalidMsg: Spotify Track ID should be alphanumeric
builtinOptions.appleMusicIdInvalidMsg: Apple Music Track ID should be numeric
builtinOptions.isrcInvalidMsg: ISRC code format should be CC-XXX-YY-NNNNN
builtinOptions.ttmlAuthorGithubLoginInvalidMsg: GitHub username should be alphanumeric or hyphens, up to 39 characters

keybindings.switchEditMode: Mode Switch - Switch to Edit Mode
keybindings.switchSyncMode: Mode Switch - Switch to Timing Mode
keybindings.switchPreviewMode: Mode Switch - Switch to Preview Mode
keybindings.moveNextWordAndPlay: Timing - Move to next word and play
keybindings.movePrevWordAndPlay: Timing - Move to previous word and play
keybindings.moveNextLine: Timing - Move to next line start
keybindings.movePrevLine: Timing - Move to previous line start

splitWordDialog.title: Split/Replace Word
splitWordDialog.tip: After splitting, new words will evenly divide the original word's start/end time. Empty beats will be cleared.
splitWordDialog.applyToAll: Apply this splitting/replacing to all identical words

contextMenu.moveWordToNewLine: Move {count, plural, one {word} other {words}} to new line

common.languageDesc: Select the language for the interface

layoutModeDesc.line1: Simple layout satisfies most basic needs
layoutModeDesc.line2: Switch to Advanced Mode if you need more efficient syncing

common.syncJudgeModeDesc: Set how timestamps are judged when syncing. Default is 'First key down'.

spectrogram.gradientEditorDesc: A Pos value of 0.0 corresponds to the quietest part, and 1.0 corresponds to the loudest part. It is recommended to use brighter colors for larger Pos values.

audioPanel.clickToLoadMusic: Click the icon button to load music

errors.uploadFailed: Failed to request upload lyrics file: {status} {statusText}
errors.submitFailed: Submission failed, check console for reason!

submitToAMLLDB.description: Submit lyrics to AMLL Lyrics Database
submitToAMLLDB.title: Submit lyrics to AMLL Lyrics Database (Simplified Chinese users only)
submitToAMLLDB.chineseOnlyWarning: This feature is only available to Simplified Chinese users of AMLL Lyrics Database. If you are editing lyrics to use them in other software, please follow that software's way to submit lyrics!
submitToAMLLDB.thankYou: First of all, thank you for your generous lyrics contribution!
submitToAMLLDB.cc0Rights: use the CC0 license and fully waive ownership of the lyrics
submitToAMLLDB.andSubmit: and submit to the lyrics database!
submitToAMLLDB.futureUse: And the lyrics will be used as default TTML source by AMLL systems in the future!
submitToAMLLDB.rightsWarning: If you value retaining ownership, please do NOT submit!
submitToAMLLDB.submitInstructions: Enter the following info then jump to the GitHub issue submission page!

newFile.title: Confirm New File
newFile.description: You have unsaved changes. If you proceed, these changes will be lost. Are you sure you want to create a new file?

openFile.title: Confirm Open File
openFile.description: You have unsaved changes. If you proceed, these changes will be lost. Are you sure you want to open a new file?

openFromClipboard.title: Confirm Open from Clipboard
openFromClipboard.description: You have unsaved changes. If you proceed, these changes will be lost. Are you sure you want to open from the clipboard?

importFile.title: Confirm Import Lyrics
importFile.description: You have unsaved changes. If you proceed, these changes will be lost. Are you sure you want to import new lyrics?

advancedSegmentDialog.title: Advanced Segmentation
advancedSegmentDialog.tip: After splitting, the original word's total duration will be redistributed based on the number of characters and their weights.

ignore.title: Ignore List
ignore.placeholder: One word per line, words in this list will not be auto-segmented

test.title: Splitting Test
test.input: Enter a lyric line or word to test...

historyRestoreDialog.title: Restore from History
historyRestoreDialog.description: Select an autosaved snapshot to restore.

confirm.title: Confirm Restore
confirm.description: This will overwrite all content in the current editor. Are you sure you want to restore this snapshot?

pwa.offlineReady: Site successfully cached for offline use
pwa.updateRefresh: Site updated, refresh to use the latest version!
